question_text: Which scenario best describes the use of Wi-Fi in enhancing location accuracy indoors?
answer_options: Wi-Fi disables GPS to conserve battery
Wi-Fi helps devices estimate position based on nearby access points
Wi-Fi redirects all location data to the carrier
Wi-Fi acts as a satellite signal repeater
correct_answer: Wi-Fi helps devices estimate position based on nearby access points
explanation: In indoor environments where GPS signals are weak, Wi-Fi networks provide location clues based on access point proximity and known location databases.
